name: Spriggan Powered
overview: Spriggan Powered is a sci-fi side-scrolling shoot 'em up and the third game in the Spriggan series. There are 6 stages in the game and the player, controlling a flying mech, has to make his way forward defeating enemies, middle bosses and final bosses on every stage. For each destroyed enemy unit the mech gains energy that can be used to power up the shield or to unleash a super attack. There is also a regular attack that can be uniquely upgraded by gathering green, orange, blue and red spheres.
